page.title: 04AGRICULTURE (CONT)
page.content:
cessed immediately and are sent directly to the freezing station where they are completely processed within three hours of picking.
{NORTON STRAWBERRY GROWERS. This company moved in to the area 11 years growing strawberries and raspberries for the self-pick market. Originally soft fruit was grown chiefly for the canning industry but the advent of the home freezer meant more and more customers wanted to pick and process their own fruit. Norton Strawberry Growers have nine farms in the Yorkshire area under the managership of Mr.S.Watson at Poplar Farm,Norton. At Norton there are 55 acres under production,mostly straw- berries which sell at 30p per lb this year.There are five varieties grown to extend the picking season. The most
